TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataServiceQueryContinuation`1<T> extends System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQueryContinuation
Public NotInheritable Class DataServiceQueryContinuation(Of T) Inherits DataServiceQueryContinuation
generic <typename T> public ref class DataServiceQueryContinuation sealed : System::Data::Services::Client::DataServiceQueryContinuation

summary.span: 封裝 URI，該 URI 會傳回分頁 WCF Data Services 查詢結果的下一頁。

span.span: Encapsulates a URI that returns the next page of a paged WCF Data Services query result.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本範例使用 `do…while` 迴圈，從資料服務的分頁結果載入 `Customers` 實體。This example uses a `do…while` loop to load `Customers` entities from a paged results from the data service.
